mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO employee( emp_emno, emp_id, emp_pswd, emp_name, emp_ename, emp_bday, emp_tno, emp_inco_date, icty_code, dept_code, rank_code, emp_mits_yn, emp_reg_date, emp_del_yn)
VALUES ( #{empEmno}, #{empId}, #{empPw}, #{empName}, #{empEname}, #{empBday}, #{empTno}, #{empIncodate}, #{ictyCode}, #{deptCode}, #{rankCode}, #{armyYN}, #{empRegDate}, 'N' )
